meanings.definition: The joint between the upper and lower parts of the arm.
meanings.sent1: She accidentally bumped her elbows on the table.
meanings.sent2: He rested his elbows on the armrest of the chair.
meanings.sent3: The elbows of the sweater were worn out from constant use.
meanings.sent4: The elbows of the river twisted and turned through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The dancer moved gracefully, emphasizing her elbows in the routine.

meanings.sent1: She elbows her way through the crowded room.
meanings.sent2: He elbows his brother playfully during the game.
meanings.sent3: The cat elbows the door to get inside the room.
meanings.sent4: In the busy market, people elbow each other to get to the front.
meanings.sent5: He elbows the bully back, standing up for himself.

meanings.definition: A pipe fitting with a right-angled bend.
meanings.sent1: The plumber used elbows to connect the pipes at a corner.
meanings.sent2: The elbows in the plumbing system ensured a smooth flow of water.
meanings.sent3: The shiny elbows gleamed under the bright light of the workshop.
meanings.sent4: The elbows in the pipeline prevented any leaks.
meanings.sent5: The elbows were crucial in redirecting the water flow efficiently.
